title.native: 史上最強の大魔王、村人Aに転生する
title.romaji: Shijou Saikyou no Daimaou, Murabito A ni Tensei suru
title.english: The Greatest Demon Lord Is Reborn as a Typical Nobody

description:
As the most powerful entity of all time, the Demon Lord Varvatos thinks life is a big fat snore. When he takes matters into his own hands and decides to reincarnate, he calibrates his magical strength to be perfectly average. But there is no way he could have predicted that everyone in the modern world would be weak as hell, which means he is totally overpowered once again! Reborn under the name Ard, he has ladies fawning over him, the royal family begging him to become the next king, and an ex-minion insisting on killing him?! But Ard has a one-track mind, and he won't stop at anything to achieve his ultimate goal!

(Source: Yen Press)
synonyms: ชีวิตใหม่ไม่ธรรมดาของราชาปีศาจขี้เหงา
Raja Iblis Terkuat Sepanjang Sejarah Terlahir Kembali Sebagai Figuran
Đại Ma Vương Mạnh Nhất Lịch Sử Chuyển Sinh Thành Dân Làng A

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

node.description: **Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/xexex36) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoshihiro_watanabe1971/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/渡邊義弘_(アニメーター%29)

An animator, character designer and adult game artist.

_Not to be confused with the producer [of the same name.](https://anilist.co/staff/233840)_
Graduated from Tama Art University in 1984.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ayakaohashi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayaka_ohashi/)

A voice actor, singer, and the drummer of [Poppin'Party](https://anilist.co/staff/153185/PoppinParty). Ayaka was born in Saitama Prefecture but moved to Tokyo after kindergarten. She became part of a theater company in elementary school and appeared in commercials, stage productions, and TV dramas. After receiving some voice acting lessons in the company, she realized that she wanted to become a voice actress. She got scouted in 2011 by Horipro and began her career. In August 2014, she debuted as a singer with her single "YES!!", which was used as the opening theme for the anime _Sabagebu!_.

Her hobbies includes karaoke as well as watching anime, drumming, browsing the internet, gaming, watching sports, and reading light novels. She had drumming skills prior to joining the _Bang Dream_ franchise. Ayaka loves heavy metal and shares her love together with her mother, who used to sing Marilyn Manson's songs for her as lullabies. Her favorite bands are Evanescence, Papa Roach, and Slipknot. She also admires [Nana Mizuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95081/). 

Ayaka is also the voice provider of the VOCALOID4 voicebank, MATCHA.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Iansan - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Angelina - Arknights (VG)

__[Official Website](http://choucho-net.com/)__ | __[Blog (JP)](http://ameblo.jp/choucho621/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/choucho_)__ | __[NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/3416529) | [Instragram](https://www.instagram.com/choucho621/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGK8Fhw3qDEtHaivTsxfGgg)__ | __[Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5t7eQ2d1UmzfIr9oWQ538Y?autoplay=true)__

__Introduction:__
ChouCho is a Japanese singer-utaite known for doing vocal covers of Vocaloid songs on NicoNico Douga, in addition to making frequent appearances in anime with original songs.

__Biography:__
In 2007, she initially formed the band Lotus*Lotus (stylized as ロータス★ロータス) while still in high school, the band performed covers of songs from anime, then starting from June 2008 she first appeared on NicoNico with her cover of the song "[Black★Rock Shooter](https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm3706654)" under stage name ちょうちょ. In 2011, she made her first major debut under record label Lantis, singing the opening theme song to the anime [Kamisama no Memochou](https://anilist.co/anime/10568/Kamisama-no-Memochou/), titled "[Kawaru Mirai](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Un9UiVL6Dms)", and later in the same year she reappeared with the opening theme song to the anime [Mashiroiro Symphony](https://anilist.co/anime/10397/Mashiroiro-Symphony-The-Color-of-Lovers), titled "[Authentic Symphony](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QzGWaS0lyIo)", then in 2012, after releasing her 4th single titled "[Yasashisa no Riyuu](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0hJiMN4Csjw)", she changed her stage name from ちょうちょ to ChouCho. The song was also used as the 1st opening theme song to the anime [Hyouka](https://anilist.co/anime/12189/Hyouka/), which released in 2012.

Her last upload to NicoNico was an album released with Comiket 81, titled "[Little Nostalgia](https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm16484379)", featuring 5 songs: Breeze, Beautiful World (Acoustic Ver.), Hana to Hoshi no Monogatari, North York and Under the Maple Tree.

__[Official Website](http://choucho-net.com/)__ | __[Blog (JP)](http://ameblo.jp/choucho621/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/choucho_)__ | __[NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/3416529) | [Instragram](https://www.instagram.com/choucho621/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGK8Fhw3qDEtHaivTsxfGgg)__ | __[Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5t7eQ2d1UmzfIr9oWQ538Y?autoplay=true)__

[Website](https://junmurayama.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jun_murayama)

__Introduction:__
Jun Murayama is a Japanese musician, known for doing music composition and arrangement, while also being a music producer, pianist and keyboardist. He is also a member of the bands Venomstrip and FLOWER FLOWER.

__Biography:__
He started playing the piano at the age of three, then later on as a third year college student, he started his professional career after being scouted by the Light Music Club. Following this he joined [Koichi Domoto's](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koichi_Domoto) tour, whom he knew from college.

He's mostly known as the keyboardist to the four-piece rock band FLOWER FLOWER with the stage name mura☆jun, which he joined in 2013. In the band his name was mistakenly introduced as 松潤 (Matsujun) when referring to members, so  instead of his actual stage name mura☆jun the fans have nicknamed him as such.
Matheus Périssé is a brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, singer, presenter and youtuber.
